entry.title: Earl Sweatshirt Drops Surprise Album via Gala Music
entry.summary: The rapper debuted a long-rumored collaboration with The Alchemist via NFTs, capping off a week of scavenger hunts and frenzied speculation.

entry.title: NFL Rivals Game Now Lets You Buy NFTs on iOS and Android
entry.summary: Mythical Games rolled out the first wave of marketplace functionality Thursday, enabling NFT purchases within the mobile game.

entry.title: AI Researchers Are Teaching Robots to Mimic Human Dexterity
entry.summary: From MIT to Stanford, researchers have been using artificial intelligence to improve robotic dexterity and tactile sensing.

entry.title: Bitcoin Wins While Fed Prints More 'Fiat Toilet Paper', Says Arthur Hayes
entry.summary: Despite quantitative tightening, the Fed may be involuntarily increasing the money supply.

entry.title: Nvidia Market Cap Overtakes Crypto as Tokens Dip and AI Booms
entry.summary: AI has sent Nvidia's market capitalization into the stratosphere. But crypto? They don't know her.

entry.title: Donald Trump NFTs Up Bigly After Indicted Former Pres. Skips GOP Debate
entry.summary: Trump skipped the GOP debate to talk with Tucker—and his NFT collection boomed.

entry.title: Apex Legends Voice Actor Ben Prendergast on the Future of Gaming
entry.summary: Voice actor Ben Prendergast, who's voiced characters in games like Apex Legends and God of War Ragnarok, shares his opinions on the tech space's history of "bubbles" and whether blockchain gaming has a future.

entry.title: AI Startup Hugging Face Hits $4.5 Billion Valuation After Google and Nvidia Backed Raise
entry.summary: Google, Amazon, Nvidia, Intel, and many others participated in the round, which brings the company's total amount raised to $395.2 million.

author.name: Decrypt AI, Edited by Stacy Elliot

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried’s Lawyers Granted Unlimited Prison Visits
entry.summary: The legal team backing Bankman-Fried has emphasized the need for thorough preparation ahead of his first trial on October 3.

entry.title: UK Government to Poll Brits on Banning Cold Calls Related to Crypto
entry.summary: The UK government is assessing how a cold call ban for financial products like crypto would affect legitimate businesses and consumers.

entry.title: 1inch Network Joins DeFi Heavweights Launching on Ethereum Layer-2 Base
entry.summary: The decentralized exchange aggregator 1inch joins Uniswap and Sushiswap on Coinbase-incubated Base blockchain.

entry.title: Why Proof of Reserves is Vital for Real-World Asset Tokenization
entry.summary: Matrixdock has partnered with Chainlink to enhance the transparency of its STBT token, backed by short-term U.S. Treasury securities.

entry.title: DeFi Exchange Token Powering dYdX Soars 9% Overnight
entry.summary: dYdX's imminent launch of its newest blockchain appears to have fueled continued speculation, with investors scooping up its token.

entry.title: Alchemy Hires Former Stripe Exec as New Head of Engineering
entry.summary: In his new role at Alchemy, Guillaume Poncin will be focused on building out new Web3 products and scaling the company’s existing services.

entry.title: How AI Could Lead To Discriminatory Hiring Practices
entry.summary: Recruiting-oriented AI tools aim to use applicant computer and cellphone cameras to analyze facial movements, speaking voice, and other parameters to create what it calls an “employability” score.

entry.title: Germany Ramps Up AI Investments Amid Global Race for Innovation
entry.summary: The German government has significantly boosted AI research funding, signaling its ambition to remain a key player in the global tech arena.

entry.title: FTX Estate Wants to Hedge Bitcoin, Ethereum With Mike Novogratz's Galaxy Digital
entry.summary: FTX wants to also sell and stake some of its crypto, hedging the company from “extreme and unpredictable price movements,” says a new filing.

entry.title: Central African Republic Eyes Tokenizing Its Natural Resources
entry.summary: Even though Bitcoin is no longer legal tender, the country remains committed to crypto.

entry.title: NVIDIA Rides AI Boom to Record-Setting Revenue
entry.summary: The company's data center and gaming products also boosted the bottom line.

author.name: Decrypt AI, Edited by Ryan Ozawa

entry.title: Dogecoin Millionaire's Fortune Fell From $3M to $50,000—But He Hasn’t Lost the Faith
entry.summary: ‘SlumDOGE Millionaire’ Glauber Contessoto still believes in the popular memecoin.

entry.title: Patrick Mahomes Can't Quit Crypto
entry.summary: The NFL superstar is bucking the current trend of mega-celebrities avoiding the beleaguered crypto industry at all costs.

entry.title: AI Startup Can Now Generate Speech Using Your Voice In 30 Languages
entry.summary: Want to know how you would sound speaking another language—without an accent? Find out with ElevenLab's new speech generator.

entry.title: GOP Debate: Where Do the Candidates Stand on Bitcoin?
entry.summary: Some candidates have called out SEC Chair Gary Gensler, while others have attacked the Federal Reserve.

entry.title: Shopify Adds Solana Pay to Its Platform to Allow USDC Payments
entry.summary: The Solana Foundation says payments through the plugin require lowers fees than using a credit card.

entry.title: The Next AI Medical Marvel: Early Detection of Parkinson’s Disease
entry.summary: An AI analysis of data from over 150,000 patients found common characteristics that could give patients several years more advance notice of disease onset.

entry.title: Selena Gomez Reacts to Cloned Voice in ‘Starboy’ AI Remix
entry.summary: The singer called the AI-generated version of The Weeknd’s hit “scary.”

entry.title: Former Corrections Officer Charged in Crypto Fraud Targeting Police
entry.summary: John DeSalvo falsely promised extraordinarily high returns and claimed the unregistered token would replace pensions.

author.name: Decrypt AI, Edited by Ryan Ozawa

entry.title: Bitstamp Ends Ethereum Staking for US Investors
entry.summary: The crypto exchange said it made the decision due to “regulatory dynamics” in the States.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Says FTX Lawyers Said Insider Loans and ‘Sham’ Agreement Were Okay
entry.summary: The FTX founder's counsel said he received legal assurance on billions of dollars in insider loans and auto-delete messages.

entry.title: Spain Just Created the First European AI Supervision Agency
entry.summary: The Spanish Agency for the Supervision of Artificial Intelligence (AESIA) has been charged with developing “inclusive, sustainable and citizen-centered” AI.

entry.title: Feds Charge Tornado Cash Founders With Money Laundering, Arresting One
entry.summary: One founder was arrested today, while the other remains at large.

entry.title: Teenage Hacker Who Leaked 'Grand Theft Auto 6' Details Convicted in UK
entry.summary: Hackers from the Lapsus$ group were found liable for various attacks, including Grand Theft Auto maker Rockstar Games, Nvidia, and Uber.

entry.title: Sony’s Latest PlayStation Handheld Launching for $200 This Year
entry.summary: The PlayStation Portal can wirelessly stream games from a PlayStation 5, but it won’t play anything on its own.

entry.title: The future of AI Stardom and Robotics with SingularityNET COO Janet Adams and Desdemona
entry.summary: In this interview, SingularityNET COO Janet Adams explains the intricate details that went into creating the Desdemona robot AI from Hanson Robotics and future plans for the AI Diva.

entry.title: Social Poker App PokerGO Play Lands on Gala Games
entry.summary: Gala Games has partnered with PokerGO to launch the NFT-based mobile and PC title, which offers daily sweepstakes.

entry.title: Bitcoin Ordinals Trading Is Down Bad—But Just How Bad?
entry.summary: Bitcoin's Ordinals are down bad from their May peak, but determining exactly how far the hype has dropped has pundits and experts feuding.

entry.title: Mobile RPG Champions Arena Launches on Gala Games
entry.summary: The turn-based RPG will be released on mobile and PC through the Gala Launcher, and features NFT Champions you can battle and upgrade.

entry.title: FBI Warns Crypto Firms That North Korean Hackers ‘May Attempt to Cash Out Bitcoin’
entry.summary: Over the past 24 hours, 1,580 Bitcoin associated with Lazarus Group and APT38 have been moved, reports the FBI.

entry.title: Binance Labs Announces Investment in Fixed-Yield Protocol Pendle Finance
entry.summary: Binance Labs' backing of Pendle Finance is also another push for the investment group into the liquid staking sector.

entry.title: Odds SEC Approves a Spot Bitcoin ETF Are 'Better Than 50/50', Says Marathon Digital CEO
entry.summary: Fred Thiel reckons the SEC’s approval of Ethereum futures ETFs will also increase chances for a spot Bitcoin ETF approval.

entry.title: Balancer Lauded for 'Excellent Communication' of Multi-Million-Dollar Vulnerability
entry.summary: Balancer disclosed a critical vulnerability, safely protecting user funds while also keeping the markets cool.

entry.title: It’s Now Harder Than Ever to Mine Bitcoin
entry.summary: Mining appears to be getting more popular, but don’t look to Bitcoin’s price to understand why.

entry.title: Crypto a 'No-Brainer' for Video Games, Says Mino Games CEO
entry.summary: Mino Games CEO Sasha MacKinnon, developer of the upcoming Dimensionals game, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the studio's approach to digital collectibles.

entry.title: Michael Wagner's 'Controversial Take' on Crypto in Games
entry.summary: At Solana's PlayGG, Star Atlas CEO Michael Wagner shares his "controversial take" on crypto in games, shares the challenges of developing the upcoming scifi game, and how crypto's volatility has changed his perspective with Decrypt's Jason Nelson.

entry.title: Interview: Angelic CEO on Building the Sci-Fi RPG on Solana and Ethereum
entry.summary: Angelic is a sci-fi roleplay game in development that will be free-to-play and offer optional, opt-in crypto features on Solana and Ethereum and a governance token. Metaverse Game Studios CEO and Founder Erkan Bayol tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how he sees AAA traditional games as Angelic's main competitors and shares his vision for the game.

entry.title: Apex Legends Voice Actor on AI's Impact on Video Games
entry.summary: Ben Prendergast is an actor who has voiced characters like Apex Legends' Fuse, God of War Ragnarok's Tyr, and Patroclus in Hades. But as debates swirl around the use of artificial intelligence in entertainment in light of the SAG-AFTRA and WGA strikes, Prendergast gives Decrypt's Kate Irwin his honest take on the potential use of AI actors in games.

entry.title: Star Atlas CEO on Developing an MMO Game
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson speaks with Star Atlas Founder and CEO Michael Wagner about the MMO game's approach to development, marketing, and blockchain integrations.

entry.title: Aurory's Origin Story: How JRPGs Inspired the Games
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson talks to Aurory's Head of Marketing and Business Development Michael Natoli about the origins of the Aurory crypto games at the Solana PlayGG event.

entry.title: Parallel TCG: Inside the Sci-Fi Card Game’s Closed Beta
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin goes hands-on with Parallel’s closed beta on Windows PC to find out what sets it apart from other crypto card-battlers.

entry.title: Web3 Games Need to Compete with All Games, Says Solana Foundation GM
entry.summary: Solana Foundation's General Manager of Games Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about Solana's PlayGG conference and shares his take on crypto gaming and the "play-to-earn" concept.

entry.title: Many Early Blockchain Games Were 'Cash Grabs,' Says Twitch Streamer Alliestrasza
entry.summary: "I wrote them off," Twitch streamer Alliestrasza said of her initial thoughts on many early blockchain games. She tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how her perspective on Web3 games has evolved over time and now sees blockchain games getting significantly better.

entry.title: 'MetalCore' Game Preview: Hands-on With the 'Titanfall' Meets 'Destiny' NFT Mashup
entry.summary: MetalCore is an upcoming mech shooter developed by Studio 369, and it's being developed on Ethereum scaling network Immutable zkEVM. Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin played through the prologue and tested out the recent Alpha 3 online experience to get a sense of the NFT-infused mashup of Titanfall and Destiny.

entry.title: 'Give Projects a Chance,' Says Aurory's Michael Natoli on NFT Game Challenges
entry.summary: Aurory is an NFT-driven game franchise that started life on Solana and is expanding to other chains. Decrypt's Jason Nelson spoke with Aurory Head of Marketing Michael Natoli at Solana's PlayGG event, where Natoli shared his thoughts on the challenges that blockchain games face in reaching players.

entry.title: Solana Is Only Network Ready for Gaming: Solana Foundation's Johnny Lee
entry.summary: Solana Foundation General Manager Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how the Solana network will tackle the scaling problem that blockchain games pose for the industry.

entry.title: Com2uS Is Going "Full Speed" on Crypto Gaming: Kyu Lee
entry.summary: Kyu Lee is the President of game studio Com2uS USA. In an interview, he shares the studio's approach to Web3 and crypto gaming with Decrypt GG's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: Building a Discord Game with AI and Blockchain: 'Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos' Creative Lead Alex Finden
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson interviews Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos Creative Director Alex Finden at the Solana PlayGG event in San Diego, California.
